plot: Everyone in the circle start looking for the remaining crystals. Their adventure takes them to Jake's grandfather, who tells them a story about their circle and reveals the whereabouts of his crystal. Adam and Melissa try getting the crystal, but they don't know that there is someone else who also wants it. Meanwhile, Jane and Charles form an alliance against a common enemy and Cassie discovers another secret about her father.

After consulting Jake's grandfather Royce Armstrong on the demonic threat, the juvenile circle is committed to John's plan to prevent evil from taking over he world trough black magic, which requires their combined family crystals. Charles and Amelia try to eliminate John but she believes his story and Blackwell came prepared before he even came. Callum tries to steal crystals to sell, but Adam beats him to the chase in the mine where Royce's is hidden. Diana was excused to enjoy a date with Grant before he must sail away, but is dragged in and ends up discovering she has Blackwell blood too.—KGF Vissers
